    1086           0 :         Q_EMIT finishInsertingTracksList();
    1087           0 :         return;
    1088             :     }
    1089             :

    1092           0 :         Q_EMIT finishInsertingTracksList();
    1093           0 :         return;
    1094             :     }
    1095             : 
    1096           0 :     initChangesTrackers();

    1099           0 :         switch (oneTrack.elementType())

    1101           0 :         case ElisaUtils::Track:
    1102             :         {
    1103           0 :             qCDebug(orgKdeElisaDatabase()) << "DatabaseInterface::insertTracksList" << "insert one track";
    1104           0 :             internalInsertOneTrack(oneTrack, covers);
    1105           0 :             break;
    1106             :         }
    1107           0 :         case ElisaUtils::Radio:
    1108             :         {
    1109           0 :             qCDebug(orgKdeElisaDatabase()) << "DatabaseInterface::insertTracksList" << "insert one radio";
    1110           0 :             internalInsertOneRadio(oneTrack);
    1111           0 :             break;
    1112             :         }
    1113           0 :         case ElisaUtils::Album:
    1114             :         case ElisaUtils::Artist:

    1116             :         case ElisaUtils::Container:
    1117             :         case ElisaUtils::FileName:
    1118             :         case ElisaUtils::Genre:
    1119             :         case ElisaUtils::Lyricist:
    1120             :         case ElisaUtils::Unknown:
    1121           0 :             qCDebug(orgKdeElisaDatabase()) << "DatabaseInterface::insertTracksList" << "invalid track data";
    1122           0 :             break;
    1123             :         }
    1124             : 
    1125           0 :         if (d->mStopRequest == 1) {
    1126           0 :             transactionResult = finishTransaction();

    1128           0 :                 Q_EMIT finishInsertingTracksList();
    1129           0 :                 return;
    1130             :             }
    1131           0 :             Q_EMIT finishInsertingTracksList();
    1132           0 :             return;
    1133             :         }
    1134             :     }
    1135             :

    1137           0 :         DataTypes::ListArtistDataType newArtists;
    1138             :

    1142           0 :                                   {DataTypes::ElementTypeRole, ElisaUtils::Artist}});
    1143             :         }
    1144           0 :         qCInfo(orgKdeElisaDatabase) << "artistsAdded" << newArtists.size();

    1146             :     }

    1154             :         }

    1158             :     }
    1159             : 
    1160           0 :     for (auto albumId : qAsConst(d->mModifiedAlbumIds)) {

    1162             :     }

    1601           0 : void DatabaseInterface::upgradeDatabaseV9()
    1602             : {

    1604             :

    1613             : 
    1614           0 :             Q_EMIT databaseError();
    1615             :         }
    1616             :     }
    1617             : 
    1618             :     {
    1619           0 :         QSqlQuery disableForeignKeys(d->mTracksDatabase);
    1620             :

    1622             : 
    1623           0 :         if (!result) {
    1624           0 :             qCDebug(orgKdeElisaDatabase) << "DatabaseInterface::upgradeDatabaseV9" << disableForeignKeys.lastQuery();

    1626             : 
    1627           0 :             Q_EMIT databaseError();
    1628             :         }
    1629             :     }
    1630             : 
    1631           0 :     d->mTracksDatabase.transaction();

    3423           5 : void DatabaseInterface::callUpgradeFunctionForVersion(DatabaseVersion databaseVersion)
    3424             : {
    3425           5 :     switch(databaseVersion)
    3426             :     {
    3427           0 :     case DatabaseInterface::V9:
    3428           0 :         upgradeDatabaseV9();
    3429           0 :         break;
    3430           0 :     case DatabaseInterface::V11:
    3431           0 :         upgradeDatabaseV11();
    3432           0 :         break;
    3433           0 :     case DatabaseInterface::V12:
    3434           0 :         upgradeDatabaseV12();
    3435           0 :         break;
    3436           0 :     case DatabaseInterface::V13:
    3437           0 :         upgradeDatabaseV13();
    3438           0 :         break;
    3439           0 :     case DatabaseInterface::V14:
    3440           0 :         upgradeDatabaseV14();
    3441           0 :         break;
    3442           0 :     case DatabaseInterface::V15:
    3443           0 :         upgradeDatabaseV15();
    3444           0 :         break;
    3445           5 :     case DatabaseInterface::V16:
    3446           5 :         upgradeDatabaseV16();
    3447           5 :         break;
    3448             :     }

    3451           0 : void DatabaseInterface::internalInsertOneTrack(const DataTypes::TrackDataType &oneTrack, const QHash<QString, QUrl> &covers)

    3453           0 :     d->mSelectTracksMapping.bindValue(QStringLiteral(":fileName"), oneTrack.resourceURI());

    3457           0 :     if (!result || !d->mSelectTracksMapping.isSelect() || !d->mSelectTracksMapping.isActive()) {

    3459             :

    3462           0 :         qCDebug(orgKdeElisaDatabase) << "DatabaseInterface::insertTracksList" << d->mSelectTracksMapping.lastError();
    3463             :

    3465             : 
    3466           0 :         rollBackTransaction();
    3467           0 :         Q_EMIT finishInsertingTracksList();
    3468           0 :         return;
    3469             :     }
    3470             : 
    3471           0 :     bool isNewTrack = !d->mSelectTracksMapping.next();
    3472             : 
    3473           0 :     if (isNewTrack) {
    3474           0 :         insertTrackOrigin(oneTrack.resourceURI(), oneTrack.fileModificationTime(),
    3475           0 :                           QDateTime::currentDateTime());
    3476           0 :     } else if (!d->mSelectTracksMapping.record().value(0).isNull() && d->mSelectTracksMapping.record().value(0).toULongLong() != 0) {
    3477           0 :         updateTrackOrigin(oneTrack.resourceURI(), oneTrack.fileModificationTime());
    3478             :     }
    3479             :

    3491           0 : void DatabaseInterface::internalInsertOneRadio(const DataTypes::TrackDataType &oneTrack)

    3494             :

    3499           0 :     query.bindValue(QStringLiteral(":httpAddress"), oneTrack.resourceURI());
    3500           0 :     query.bindValue(QStringLiteral(":radioId"), oneTrack.databaseId());
    3501           0 :     query.bindValue(QStringLiteral(":title"), oneTrack.title());
    3502           0 :     query.bindValue(QStringLiteral(":comment"), oneTrack.comment());
    3503           0 :     query.bindValue(QStringLiteral(":trackRating"), oneTrack.rating());
    3504           0 :     query.bindValue(QStringLiteral(":imageAddress"), oneTrack.albumCover());

    3507             :

    3516           0 :             auto radio = internalOneRadioPartialData(internalRadioIdFromHttpAddress(oneTrack.resourceURI().toString()));

    3537          15 :         auto selectAlbumQueryText = QStringLiteral("SELECT "
    3538             :                                                    "album.`ID`, "
    3539             :                                                    "album.`Title`, "
    3540             :                                                    "album.`ArtistName`, "
    3541             :                                                    "album.`AlbumPath`, "
    3542             :                                                    "album.`CoverFileName`, "
    3543             :                                                    "("
    3544             :                                                    "SELECT "
    3545             :                                                    "COUNT(*) "
    3546             :                                                    "FROM "
    3547             :                                                    "`Tracks` tracks3 "
    3548             :                                                    "WHERE "
    3549             :                                                    "tracks3.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    3550             :                                                    "(tracks3.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    3551             :                                                    "(tracks3.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    3552             :                                                    "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL"
    3553             :                                                    ")"
    3554             :                                                    ") AND "
    3555             :                                                    "tracks3.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    3556             :                                                    ") as `TracksCount`, "
    3557             :                                                    "("
    3558             :                                                    "SELECT "
    3559             :                                                    "COUNT(DISTINCT tracks2.DiscNumber) <= 1 "
    3560             :                                                    "FROM "
    3561             :                                                    "`Tracks` tracks2 "
    3562             :                                                    "WHERE "
    3563             :                                                    "tracks2.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    3564             :                                                    "(tracks2.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    3565             :                                                    "(tracks2.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    3566             :                                                    "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL"
    3567             :                                                    ")"
    3568             :                                                    ") AND "
    3569             :                                                    "tracks2.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    3570             :                                                    ") as `IsSingleDiscAlbum`, "
    3571             :                                                    "COUNT(DISTINCT tracks.`ArtistName`) as ArtistsCount, "
    3572             :                                                    "GROUP_CONCAT(tracks.`ArtistName`, ', ') as AllArtists, "
    3573             :                                                    "MAX(tracks.`Rating`) as HighestRating, "
    3574             :                                                    "GROUP_CONCAT(genres.`Name`, ', ') as AllGenres, "
    3575             :                                                    "( "
    3576             :                                                    "SELECT tracksCover.`FileName` "
    3577             :                                                    "FROM "
    3578             :                                                    "`Tracks` tracksCover "
    3579             :                                                    "WHERE "
    3580             :                                                    "tracksCover.`HasEmbeddedCover` = 1 AND "
    3581             :                                                    "tracksCover.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    3582             :                                                    "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    3583             :                                                    "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    3584             :                                                    "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    3585             :                                                    ") "
    3586             :                                                    ") AND "

    3590             :                                                    "`Albums` album LEFT JOIN "
    3591             :                                                    "`Tracks` tracks ON "
    3592             :                                                    "tracks.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "

    3603             :                                                    "WHERE "
    3604             :                                                    "album.`ID` = :albumId "
    3605             :                                                    "GROUP BY album.`ID`");

    3916             :                                                    "WHERE "
    3917             :                                                    "EXISTS ("
    3918             :                                                    "  SELECT tracks2.`Genre` "
    3919             :                                                    "  FROM "
    3920             :                                                    "  `Tracks` tracks2, "
    3921             :                                                    "  `Genre` genre2 "
    3922             :                                                    "  WHERE "
    3923             :                                                    "  (tracks2.`ArtistName` = artists.`Name` OR tracks2.`AlbumArtistName` = artists.`Name`) AND "
    3924             :                                                    "  tracks2.`Genre` = genre2.`Name` AND "
    3925             :                                                    "  genre2.`Name` = :genreFilter "
    3926             :                                                    ") AND "
    3927             :                                                    "artists.`ID` = :databaseId");
    3928             : 
    3929           5 :         auto result = prepareQuery(d->mArtistMatchGenreQuery, artistMatchGenreText);
    3930             :

    4019             :                                                   "WHERE "

    4023             :                                                   "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL"
    4024             :                                                   ")"

    4038             :                                                   "tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate`, "
    4039             :                                                   "tracksMapping.`LastPlayDate`, "
    4040             :                                                   "tracksMapping.`PlayCounter`, "
    4041             :                                                   "tracksMapping.`PlayCounter` / (strftime('%s', 'now') - tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate`) as PlayFrequency, "
    4042             :                                                   "( "
    4043             :                                                   "SELECT tracksCover.`FileName` "
    4044             :                                                   "FROM "
    4045             :                                                   "`Tracks` tracksCover "
    4046             :                                                   "WHERE "
    4047             :                                                   "tracksCover.`HasEmbeddedCover` = 1 AND "
    4048             :                                                   "tracksCover.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4049             :                                                   "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    4050             :                                                   "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    4051             :                                                   "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    4052             :                                                   ") "
    4053             :                                                   ") AND "
    4054             :                                                   "tracksCover.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4055             :                                                   ") as EmbeddedCover "
    4056             :                                                   "FROM "
    4057             :                                                   "`TracksData` tracksMapping "
    4058             :                                                   "LEFT JOIN "
    4059             :                                                   "`Tracks` tracks "
    4060             :                                                   "ON "
    4061             :                                                   "tracksMapping.`FileName` = tracks.`FileName` "
    4062             :                                                   "LEFT JOIN "
    4063             :                                                   "`Albums` album "
    4064             :                                                   "ON "
    4065             :                                                   "tracks.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4066             :                                                   "(tracks.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR tracks.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL ) AND "

    4069             :                                                   "LEFT JOIN `Composer` trackComposer ON trackComposer.`Name` = tracks.`Composer` "
    4070             :                                                   "LEFT JOIN `Lyricist` trackLyricist ON trackLyricist.`Name` = tracks.`Lyricist` "

    4316             :                                                   "CAST(tracksMapping.`PlayCounter` AS REAL) / ((CAST(strftime('%s','now') as INTEGER) - CAST(tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate` / 1000 as INTEGER)) / CAST(1000 AS REAL)) as PlayFrequency, "

    4318             :                                                   "SELECT tracksCover.`FileName` "
    4319             :                                                   "FROM "
    4320             :                                                   "`Tracks` tracksCover "

    4330             :                                                   ") as EmbeddedCover "

    4333             :                                                   "`TracksData` tracksMapping "
    4334             :                                                   "LEFT JOIN "
    4335             :                                                   "`Albums` album "
    4336             :                                                   "ON "
    4337             :                                                   "tracks.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4338             :                                                   "(tracks.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR tracks.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL ) AND "
    4339             :                                                   "tracks.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4340             :                                                   "LEFT JOIN `Genre` trackGenre ON trackGenre.`Name` = tracks.`Genre` "
    4341             :                                                   "LEFT JOIN `Composer` trackComposer ON trackComposer.`Name` = tracks.`Composer` "
    4342             :                                                   "LEFT JOIN `Lyricist` trackLyricist ON trackLyricist.`Name` = tracks.`Lyricist` "
    4343             :                                                   "WHERE "
    4344             :                                                   "tracksMapping.`FileName` = tracks.`FileName` AND "
    4345             :                                                   "tracksMapping.`PlayCounter` > 0 AND "
    4346             :                                                   "tracks.`Priority` = ("
    4347             :                                                   "     SELECT "
    4348             :                                                   "     MIN(`Priority`) "
    4349             :                                                   "     FROM "
    4350             :                                                   "     `Tracks` tracks2 "
    4351             :                                                   "     WHERE "
    4352             :                                                   "     tracks.`Title` = tracks2.`Title` AND "
    4353             :                                                   "     (tracks.`ArtistName` IS NULL OR tracks.`ArtistName` = tracks2.`ArtistName`) AND "
    4354             :                                                   "     (tracks.`AlbumTitle` IS NULL OR tracks.`AlbumTitle` = tracks2.`AlbumTitle`) AND "
    4355             :                                                   "     (tracks.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL OR tracks.`AlbumArtistName` = tracks2.`AlbumArtistName`) AND "
    4356             :                                                   "     (tracks.`AlbumPath` IS NULL OR tracks.`AlbumPath` = tracks2.`AlbumPath`)"
    4357             :                                                   ")"
    4358             :                                                   "ORDER BY CAST(tracksMapping.`PlayCounter` AS REAL) / ((CAST(strftime('%s','now') as INTEGER) - CAST(tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate` / 1000 as INTEGER)) / CAST(1000 AS REAL)) DESC "
    4359             :                                                   "LIMIT :maximumResults");
    4360             : 
    4361           5 :         auto result = prepareQuery(d->mSelectAllFrequentlyPlayedTracksQuery, selectAllTracksText);
    4362             : 
    4363           5 :         if (!result) {
    4364           0 :             qCDebug(orgKdeElisaDatabase) << "DatabaseInterface::initRequest" << d->mSelectAllFrequentlyPlayedTracksQuery.lastQuery();
    4365           0 :             qCDebug(orgKdeElisaDatabase) << "DatabaseInterface::initRequest" << d->mSelectAllFrequentlyPlayedTracksQuery.lastError();
    4366             : 
    4367           0 :             Q_EMIT databaseError();
    4368             :         }

    4639          15 :         auto selectTrackQueryText = QStringLiteral("SELECT "
    4640             :                                                    "tracks.`ID`, "
    4641             :                                                    "tracks.`Title`, "
    4642             :                                                    "album.`ID`, "
    4643             :                                                    "tracks.`ArtistName`, "
    4644             :                                                    "( "
    4645             :                                                    "SELECT "
    4646             :                                                    "COUNT(DISTINCT tracksFromAlbum1.`ArtistName`) "
    4647             :                                                    "FROM "
    4648             :                                                    "`Tracks` tracksFromAlbum1 "
    4649             :                                                    "WHERE "
    4650             :                                                    "tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4651             :                                                    "(tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    4652             :                                                    "(tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    4653             :                                                    "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    4654             :                                                    ") "
    4655             :                                                    ") AND "
    4656             :                                                    "tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4657             :                                                    ") AS ArtistsCount, "
    4658             :                                                    "( "
    4659             :                                                    "SELECT "
    4660             :                                                    "GROUP_CONCAT(tracksFromAlbum2.`ArtistName`) "
    4661             :                                                    "FROM "
    4662             :                                                    "`Tracks` tracksFromAlbum2 "
    4663             :                                                    "WHERE "
    4664             :                                                    "tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4665             :                                                    "(tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    4666             :                                                    "(tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    4667             :                                                    "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    4668             :                                                    ") "
    4669             :                                                    ") AND "
    4670             :                                                    "tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4671             :                                                    ") AS AllArtists, "
    4672             :                                                    "tracks.`AlbumArtistName`, "
    4673             :                                                    "tracksMapping.`FileName`, "
    4674             :                                                    "tracksMapping.`FileModifiedTime`, "
    4675             :                                                    "tracks.`TrackNumber`, "
    4676             :                                                    "tracks.`DiscNumber`, "
    4677             :                                                    "tracks.`Duration`, "
    4678             :                                                    "tracks.`AlbumTitle`, "
    4679             :                                                    "tracks.`Rating`, "
    4680             :                                                    "album.`CoverFileName`, "
    4681             :                                                    "("
    4682             :                                                    "SELECT "
    4683             :                                                    "COUNT(DISTINCT tracks2.DiscNumber) <= 1 "
    4684             :                                                    "FROM "
    4685             :                                                    "`Tracks` tracks2 "
    4686             :                                                    "WHERE "
    4687             :                                                    "tracks2.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4688             :                                                    "(tracks2.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    4689             :                                                    "(tracks2.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    4690             :                                                    "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL"
    4691             :                                                    ")"
    4692             :                                                    ") AND "
    4693             :                                                    "tracks2.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4694             :                                                    ") as `IsSingleDiscAlbum`, "
    4695             :                                                    "trackGenre.`Name`, "
    4696             :                                                    "trackComposer.`Name`, "
    4697             :                                                    "trackLyricist.`Name`, "
    4698             :                                                    "tracks.`Comment`, "
    4699             :                                                    "tracks.`Year`, "
    4700             :                                                    "tracks.`Channels`, "
    4701             :                                                    "tracks.`BitRate`, "
    4702             :                                                    "tracks.`SampleRate`, "
    4703             :                                                    "tracks.`HasEmbeddedCover`, "
    4704             :                                                    "tracksMapping.`ImportDate`, "
    4705             :                                                    "tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate`, "
    4706             :                                                    "tracksMapping.`LastPlayDate`, "
    4707             :                                                    "tracksMapping.`PlayCounter`, "
    4708             :                                                    "tracksMapping.`PlayCounter` / (strftime('%s', 'now') - tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate`) as PlayFrequency, "
    4709             :                                                    "( "
    4710             :                                                    "SELECT tracksCover.`FileName` "
    4711             :                                                    "FROM "
    4712             :                                                    "`Tracks` tracksCover "
    4713             :                                                    "WHERE "
    4714             :                                                    "tracksCover.`HasEmbeddedCover` = 1 AND "
    4715             :                                                    "tracksCover.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4716             :                                                    "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    4717             :                                                    "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    4718             :                                                    "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    4719             :                                                    ") "
    4720             :                                                    ") AND "
    4721             :                                                    "tracksCover.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4722             :                                                    ") as EmbeddedCover "
    4723             :                                                    "FROM "
    4724             :                                                    "`Tracks` tracks, "
    4725             :                                                    "`TracksData` tracksMapping "
    4726             :                                                    "LEFT JOIN "
    4727             :                                                    "`Albums` album "
    4728             :                                                    "ON "
    4729             :                                                    "album.`ID` = :albumId AND "
    4730             :                                                    "tracks.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4731             :                                                    "(tracks.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR tracks.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL ) AND "
    4732             :                                                    "tracks.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4733             :                                                    "LEFT JOIN `Composer` trackComposer ON trackComposer.`Name` = tracks.`Composer` "
    4734             :                                                    "LEFT JOIN `Lyricist` trackLyricist ON trackLyricist.`Name` = tracks.`Lyricist` "
    4735             :                                                    "LEFT JOIN `Genre` trackGenre ON trackGenre.`Name` = tracks.`Genre` "
    4736             :                                                    "WHERE "
    4737             :                                                    "tracksMapping.`FileName` = tracks.`FileName` AND "
    4738             :                                                    "album.`ID` = :albumId AND "
    4739             :                                                    "tracks.`Priority` = ("
    4740             :                                                    "     SELECT "
    4741             :                                                    "     MIN(`Priority`) "
    4742             :                                                    "     FROM "
    4743             :                                                    "     `Tracks` tracks2 "
    4744             :                                                    "     WHERE "
    4745             :                                                    "     tracks.`Title` = tracks2.`Title` AND "
    4746             :                                                    "     (tracks.`ArtistName` IS NULL OR tracks.`ArtistName` = tracks2.`ArtistName`) AND "
    4747             :                                                    "     (tracks.`AlbumTitle` IS NULL OR tracks.`AlbumTitle` = tracks2.`AlbumTitle`) AND "
    4748             :                                                    "     (tracks.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL OR tracks.`AlbumArtistName` = tracks2.`AlbumArtistName`) AND "
    4749             :                                                    "     (tracks.`AlbumPath` IS NULL OR tracks.`AlbumPath` = tracks2.`AlbumPath`)"
    4750             :                                                    ")"
    4751             :                                                    "ORDER BY tracks.`DiscNumber` ASC, "
    4752             :                                                    "tracks.`TrackNumber` ASC");
    4753             : 
    4754           5 :         auto result = prepareQuery(d->mSelectTrackQuery, selectTrackQueryText);
    4755             : 
    4756           5 :         if (!result) {
    4757           0 :             qCDebug(orgKdeElisaDatabase) << "DatabaseInterface::initRequest" << d->mSelectTrackQuery.lastQuery();
    4758           0 :             qCDebug(orgKdeElisaDatabase) << "DatabaseInterface::initRequest" << d->mSelectTrackQuery.lastError();
    4759             : 
    4760           0 :             Q_EMIT databaseError();
    4761             :         }
    4762             :     }
    4763             : 
    4764             :     {
    4765          15 :         auto selectTrackQueryText = QStringLiteral("SELECT "
    4766             :                                                    "tracks.`ID` "
    4767             :                                                    "FROM "
    4768             :                                                    "`Tracks` tracks, "
    4769             :                                                    "`TracksData` tracksMapping "
    4770             :                                                    "LEFT JOIN "
    4771             :                                                    "`Albums` album "
    4772             :                                                    "ON "
    4773             :                                                    "album.`ID` = :albumId AND "
    4774             :                                                    "tracks.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4775             :                                                    "(tracks.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR tracks.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL ) AND "
    4776             :                                                    "tracks.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4777             :                                                    "WHERE "
    4778             :                                                    "tracksMapping.`FileName` = tracks.`FileName` AND "
    4779             :                                                    "album.`ID` = :albumId AND "
    4780             :                                                    "tracks.`Priority` = ("
    4781             :                                                    "     SELECT "
    4782             :                                                    "     MIN(`Priority`) "
    4783             :                                                    "     FROM "
    4784             :                                                    "     `Tracks` tracks2 "
    4785             :                                                    "     WHERE "
    4786             :                                                    "     tracks.`Title` = tracks2.`Title` AND "
    4787             :                                                    "     (tracks.`ArtistName` IS NULL OR tracks.`ArtistName` = tracks2.`ArtistName`) AND "
    4788             :                                                    "     (tracks.`AlbumTitle` IS NULL OR tracks.`AlbumTitle` = tracks2.`AlbumTitle`) AND "
    4789             :                                                    "     (tracks.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL OR tracks.`AlbumArtistName` = tracks2.`AlbumArtistName`) AND "
    4790             :                                                    "     (tracks.`AlbumPath` IS NULL OR tracks.`AlbumPath` = tracks2.`AlbumPath`)"
    4791             :                                                    ")"
    4792             :                                                    "ORDER BY tracks.`DiscNumber` ASC, "
    4793             :                                                    "tracks.`TrackNumber` ASC");
    4794             : 
    4795           5 :         auto result = prepareQuery(d->mSelectTrackIdQuery, selectTrackQueryText);

    4806          15 :         auto selectTrackFromIdQueryText = QStringLiteral("SELECT "
    4807             :                                                          "tracks.`Id`, "
    4808             :                                                          "tracks.`Title`, "
    4809             :                                                          "album.`ID`, "
    4810             :                                                          "tracks.`ArtistName`, "
    4811             :                                                          "( "
    4812             :                                                          "SELECT "
    4813             :                                                          "COUNT(DISTINCT tracksFromAlbum1.`ArtistName`) "
    4814             :                                                          "FROM "
    4815             :                                                          "`Tracks` tracksFromAlbum1 "
    4816             :                                                          "WHERE "
    4817             :                                                          "tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4818             :                                                          "(tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    4819             :                                                          "(tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    4820             :                                                          "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    4821             :                                                          ") "
    4822             :                                                          ") AND "
    4823             :                                                          "tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4824             :                                                          ") AS ArtistsCount, "
    4825             :                                                          "( "
    4826             :                                                          "SELECT "
    4827             :                                                          "GROUP_CONCAT(tracksFromAlbum2.`ArtistName`) "
    4828             :                                                          "FROM "
    4829             :                                                          "`Tracks` tracksFromAlbum2 "
    4830             :                                                          "WHERE "
    4831             :                                                          "tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "

    4833             :                                                          "(tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    4834             :                                                          "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    4835             :                                                          ") "
    4836             :                                                          ") AND "
    4837             :                                                          "tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4838             :                                                          ") AS AllArtists, "
    4839             :                                                          "tracks.`AlbumArtistName`, "
    4840             :                                                          "tracksMapping.`FileName`, "
    4841             :                                                          "tracksMapping.`FileModifiedTime`, "
    4842             :                                                          "tracks.`TrackNumber`, "
    4843             :                                                          "tracks.`DiscNumber`, "
    4844             :                                                          "tracks.`Duration`, "
    4845             :                                                          "tracks.`AlbumTitle`, "
    4846             :                                                          "tracks.`Rating`, "
    4847             :                                                          "album.`CoverFileName`, "
    4848             :                                                          "("
    4849             :                                                          "SELECT "
    4850             :                                                          "COUNT(DISTINCT tracks2.DiscNumber) <= 1 "
    4851             :                                                          "FROM "
    4852             :                                                          "`Tracks` tracks2 "
    4853             :                                                          "WHERE "
    4854             :                                                          "tracks2.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "

    4856             :                                                          "(tracks2.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    4857             :                                                          "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL"
    4858             :                                                          ")"
    4859             :                                                          ") AND "
    4860             :                                                          "tracks2.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    4861             :                                                          ") as `IsSingleDiscAlbum`, "
    4862             :                                                          "trackGenre.`Name`, "
    4863             :                                                          "trackComposer.`Name`, "
    4864             :                                                          "trackLyricist.`Name`, "
    4865             :                                                          "tracks.`Comment`, "
    4866             :                                                          "tracks.`Year`, "

    4868             :                                                          "tracks.`BitRate`, "
    4869             :                                                          "tracks.`SampleRate`, "

    4875             :                                                          "tracksMapping.`PlayCounter` / (strftime('%s', 'now') - tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate`) as PlayFrequency, "
    4876             :                                                          "( "
    4877             :                                                          "SELECT tracksCover.`FileName` "
    4878             :                                                          "FROM "
    4879             :                                                          "`Tracks` tracksCover "
    4880             :                                                          "WHERE "
    4881             :                                                          "tracksCover.`HasEmbeddedCover` = 1 AND "
    4882             :                                                          "tracksCover.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    4883             :                                                          "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "

    4886             :                                                          ") "

    5325          15 :         auto selectTracksWithoutMappingQueryText = QStringLiteral("SELECT "
    5326             :                                                                   "tracks.`Id`, "
    5327             :                                                                   "tracks.`Title`, "
    5328             :                                                                   "album.`ID`, "
    5329             :                                                                   "tracks.`ArtistName`, "
    5330             :                                                                   "( "
    5331             :                                                                   "SELECT "
    5332             :                                                                   "COUNT(DISTINCT tracksFromAlbum1.`ArtistName`) "
    5333             :                                                                   "FROM "
    5334             :                                                                   "`Tracks` tracksFromAlbum1 "
    5335             :                                                                   "WHERE "
    5336             :                                                                   "tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    5337             :                                                                   "(tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    5338             :                                                                   "(tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    5339             :                                                                   "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    5340             :                                                                   ") "
    5341             :                                                                   ") AND "
    5342             :                                                                   "tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    5343             :                                                                   ") AS ArtistsCount, "
    5344             :                                                                   "( "
    5345             :                                                                   "SELECT "
    5346             :                                                                   "GROUP_CONCAT(tracksFromAlbum2.`ArtistName`) "
    5347             :                                                                   "FROM "
    5348             :                                                                   "`Tracks` tracksFromAlbum2 "
    5349             :                                                                   "WHERE "
    5350             :                                                                   "tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    5351             :                                                                   "(tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    5352             :                                                                   "(tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    5353             :                                                                   "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    5354             :                                                                   ") "
    5355             :                                                                   ") AND "
    5356             :                                                                   "tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    5357             :                                                                   ") AS AllArtists, "
    5358             :                                                                   "tracks.`AlbumArtistName`, "
    5359             :                                                                   "\"\" as FileName, "
    5360             :                                                                   "NULL as FileModifiedTime, "
    5361             :                                                                   "tracks.`TrackNumber`, "
    5362             :                                                                   "tracks.`DiscNumber`, "
    5363             :                                                                   "tracks.`Duration`, "
    5364             :                                                                   "tracks.`AlbumTitle`, "
    5365             :                                                                   "tracks.`Rating`, "
    5366             :                                                                   "album.`CoverFileName`, "
    5367             :                                                                   "("
    5368             :                                                                   "SELECT "
    5369             :                                                                   "COUNT(DISTINCT tracks2.DiscNumber) <= 1 "
    5370             :                                                                   "FROM "
    5371             :                                                                   "`Tracks` tracks2 "
    5372             :                                                                   "WHERE "
    5373             :                                                                   "tracks2.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    5374             :                                                                   "(tracks2.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    5375             :                                                                   "(tracks2.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    5376             :                                                                   "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL"
    5377             :                                                                   ")"
    5378             :                                                                   ") AND "
    5379             :                                                                   "tracks2.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    5380             :                                                                   ") as `IsSingleDiscAlbum`, "
    5381             :                                                                   "trackGenre.`Name`, "
    5382             :                                                                   "trackComposer.`Name`, "
    5383             :                                                                   "trackLyricist.`Name`, "
    5384             :                                                                   "tracks.`Comment`, "
    5385             :                                                                   "tracks.`Year`, "
    5386             :                                                                   "tracks.`Channels`, "
    5387             :                                                                   "tracks.`BitRate`, "
    5388             :                                                                   "tracks.`SampleRate`, "
    5389             :                                                                   "tracks.`HasEmbeddedCover`, "
    5390             :                                                                   "tracksMapping.`ImportDate`, "
    5391             :                                                                   "tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate`, "
    5392             :                                                                   "tracksMapping.`LastPlayDate`, "
    5393             :                                                                   "tracksMapping.`PlayCounter`, "
    5394             :                                                                   "tracksMapping.`PlayCounter` / (strftime('%s', 'now') - tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate`) as PlayFrequency, "
    5395             :                                                                   "( "
    5396             :                                                                   "SELECT tracksCover.`FileName` "
    5397             :                                                                   "FROM "
    5398             :                                                                   "`Tracks` tracksCover "
    5399             :                                                                   "WHERE "
    5400             :                                                                   "tracksCover.`HasEmbeddedCover` = 1 AND "
    5401             :                                                                   "tracksCover.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    5402             :                                                                   "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    5403             :                                                                   "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    5404             :                                                                   "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    5405             :                                                                   ") "
    5406             :                                                                   ") AND "
    5407             :                                                                   "tracksCover.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    5408             :                                                                   ") as EmbeddedCover "
    5409             :                                                                   "FROM "
    5410             :                                                                   "`Tracks` tracks, "
    5411             :                                                                   "`TracksData` tracksMapping "
    5412             :                                                                   "LEFT JOIN "
    5413             :                                                                   "`Albums` album "
    5414             :                                                                   "ON "
    5415             :                                                                   "tracks.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    5416             :                                                                   "(tracks.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR tracks.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL ) AND "

    5889             :                                                    "tracks.`Title` = :title AND "
    5890             :                                                    "(tracks.`AlbumTitle` = :album OR (:album IS NULL AND tracks.`AlbumTitle` IS NULL)) AND "
    5891             :                                                    "(tracks.`TrackNumber` = :trackNumber OR (:trackNumber IS NULL AND tracks.`TrackNumber` IS NULL)) AND "
    5892             :                                                    "(tracks.`DiscNumber` = :discNumber OR (:discNumber IS NULL AND tracks.`DiscNumber` IS NULL)) AND "

    5960             : 
    5961           0 :             Q_EMIT databaseError();
    5962             :         }
    5963             :     }
    5964             : 
    5965             :     {
    5966          15 :         auto selectTracksFromArtistQueryText = QStringLiteral("SELECT "
    5967             :                                                               "tracks.`ID`, "
    5968             :                                                               "tracks.`Title`, "
    5969             :                                                               "album.`ID`, "
    5970             :                                                               "tracks.`ArtistName`, "
    5971             :                                                               "( "
    5972             :                                                               "SELECT "
    5973             :                                                               "COUNT(DISTINCT tracksFromAlbum1.`ArtistName`) "
    5974             :                                                               "FROM "
    5975             :                                                               "`Tracks` tracksFromAlbum1 "
    5976             :                                                               "WHERE "
    5977             :                                                               "tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    5978             :                                                               "(tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    5979             :                                                               "(tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    5980             :                                                               "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    5981             :                                                               ") "
    5982             :                                                               ") AND "
    5983             :                                                               "tracksFromAlbum1.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    5984             :                                                               ") AS ArtistsCount, "
    5985             :                                                               "( "
    5986             :                                                               "SELECT "
    5987             :                                                               "GROUP_CONCAT(tracksFromAlbum2.`ArtistName`) "
    5988             :                                                               "FROM "
    5989             :                                                               "`Tracks` tracksFromAlbum2 "
    5990             :                                                               "WHERE "
    5991             :                                                               "tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    5992             :                                                               "(tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    5993             :                                                               "(tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    5994             :                                                               "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    5995             :                                                               ") "
    5996             :                                                               ") AND "
    5997             :                                                               "tracksFromAlbum2.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    5998             :                                                               ") AS AllArtists, "
    5999             :                                                               "tracks.`AlbumArtistName`, "
    6000             :                                                               "tracksMapping.`FileName`, "
    6001             :                                                               "tracksMapping.`FileModifiedTime`, "
    6002             :                                                               "tracks.`TrackNumber`, "
    6003             :                                                               "tracks.`DiscNumber`, "
    6004             :                                                               "tracks.`Duration`, "
    6005             :                                                               "tracks.`AlbumTitle`, "
    6006             :                                                               "tracks.`Rating`, "
    6007             :                                                               "album.`CoverFileName`, "
    6008             :                                                               "("
    6009             :                                                               "SELECT "
    6010             :                                                               "COUNT(DISTINCT tracks2.DiscNumber) <= 1 "
    6011             :                                                               "FROM "
    6012             :                                                               "`Tracks` tracks2 "
    6013             :                                                               "WHERE "
    6014             :                                                               "tracks2.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    6015             :                                                               "(tracks2.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    6016             :                                                               "(tracks2.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    6017             :                                                               "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL"
    6018             :                                                               ")"
    6019             :                                                               ") AND "
    6020             :                                                               "tracks2.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    6021             :                                                               ") as `IsSingleDiscAlbum`, "
    6022             :                                                               "trackGenre.`Name`, "
    6023             :                                                               "trackComposer.`Name`, "
    6024             :                                                               "trackLyricist.`Name`, "
    6025             :                                                               "tracks.`Comment`, "
    6026             :                                                               "tracks.`Year`, "
    6027             :                                                               "tracks.`Channels`, "
    6028             :                                                               "tracks.`BitRate`, "
    6029             :                                                               "tracks.`SampleRate`, "
    6030             :                                                               "tracks.`HasEmbeddedCover`, "
    6031             :                                                               "tracksMapping.`ImportDate`, "
    6032             :                                                               "tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate`, "
    6033             :                                                               "tracksMapping.`LastPlayDate`, "
    6034             :                                                               "tracksMapping.`PlayCounter`, "
    6035             :                                                               "tracksMapping.`PlayCounter` / (strftime('%s', 'now') - tracksMapping.`FirstPlayDate`) as PlayFrequency, "
    6036             :                                                               "( "
    6037             :                                                               "SELECT tracksCover.`FileName` "
    6038             :                                                               "FROM "
    6039             :                                                               "`Tracks` tracksCover "
    6040             :                                                               "WHERE "
    6041             :                                                               "tracksCover.`HasEmbeddedCover` = 1 AND "
    6042             :                                                               "tracksCover.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    6043             :                                                               "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR "
    6044             :                                                               "(tracksCover.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL AND "
    6045             :                                                               "album.`ArtistName` IS NULL "
    6046             :                                                               ") "
    6047             :                                                               ") AND "
    6048             :                                                               "tracksCover.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    6049             :                                                               ") as EmbeddedCover "
    6050             :                                                               "FROM "
    6051             :                                                               "`Tracks` tracks, "
    6052             :                                                               "`TracksData` tracksMapping "
    6053             :                                                               "LEFT JOIN "
    6054             :                                                               "`Albums` album "
    6055             :                                                               "ON "
    6056             :                                                               "tracks.`AlbumTitle` = album.`Title` AND "
    6057             :                                                               "(tracks.`AlbumArtistName` = album.`ArtistName` OR tracks.`AlbumArtistName` IS NULL ) AND "
    6058             :                                                               "tracks.`AlbumPath` = album.`AlbumPath` "
    6059             :                                                               "LEFT JOIN `Composer` trackComposer ON trackComposer.`Name` = tracks.`Composer` "
    6060             :                                                               "LEFT JOIN `Lyricist` trackLyricist ON trackLyricist.`Name` = tracks.`Lyricist` "
    6061             :                                                               "LEFT JOIN `Genre` trackGenre ON trackGenre.`Name` = tracks.`Genre` "
    6062             :                                                               "WHERE "
    6063             :                                                               "tracks.`ArtistName` = :artistName AND "
    6064             :                                                               "tracksMapping.`FileName` = tracks.`FileName` AND "
    6065             :                                                               "tracks.`Priority` = ("
    6066             :                                                               "     SELECT "
    6067             :                                                               "     MIN(`Priority`) "
    6068             :                                                               "     FROM "
    6069             :                                                               "     `Tracks` tracks2 "
